content: cute little hat for a newborn boy or girl this is such an easy stitch pattern to knit and i love the result sizes ~ large premature small newborn newborn 3 - 6 months 9 - 12 months requires ~ dk 8ply yarn & 4mm needles matching cardigan and blanket also available worked flat and then seamed so sweet **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
